content.text:
# 2025 St. George Illawarra Dragons season

|cup_link=|cup_result=|CEO_title=CEO|CEO=Tim Watsford|coach_title=Coach|coach=Shane Flanagan|captain=Damien Cook & Clinton Gutherson|stadium=WIN Stadium   Jubilee Stadium |avg_attendance=12,505|agg_attendance=|high_attendance=18,191 |top_tries=Tyrell Sloan (17)|top_goals=|top_points=Valentine Holmes (114)|prev_season=2024|next_season=2026|list=yes|list_link=List of St. George Illawarra Dragons seasons}}The 2025 St. George Illawarra Dragons season was the 27th season in the club's history. They competed in the National Rugby League.
New signings Damien Cook and Clinton Gutherson were co-captains, whilst head coach Shane Flanagan had his second season in the position.
